verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered צֹפַ֥ר <S%H6691><s%> Zophar הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֗י <S%H5284><s%> the Naamathite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

לָ֭כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שְׂעִפַּ֣י <S%H5587><s%> Therefore do my thoughts יְשִׁיב֑וּנִי <S%H7725><s%> cause me to answer וּ֝בַעֲב֗וּר <S%H5668><s%> because ח֣וּשִׁי <S%H2363><s%> and for [this] I make haste בִֽי׃

מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> the check כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <S%H3639><s%> of my reproach אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> I have heard וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit מִֽבִּינָתִ֥י <S%H998><s%> of my understanding יַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> causeth me to answer

הֲזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> you יָ֭דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Knowest מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> thou [not] this of old מִנִּ֤י <S%H4480><s%> From שִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> was placed אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> since man עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon earth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> That רִנְנַ֣ת <S%H7445><s%> That the triumphing רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked מִקָּר֑וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] short וְשִׂמְחַ֖ת <S%H8057><s%> and the joy חָנֵ֣ף <S%H2611><s%> of the hypocrite עֲדֵי־ <S%H5704><s%> against רָֽגַע׃ <S%H7281><s%> instant

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> mount up לַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> to the heavens שִׂיא֑וֹ <S%H7863><s%> Though his excellency וְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> and his head לָעָ֥ב <S%H5645><s%> unto the clouds יַגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H5060><s%> reach

כְּֽ֭גֶלֲלוֹ <S%H1561><s%> like his own dung לָנֶ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> for ever יֹאבֵ֑ד <S%H6><s%> [Yet] he shall perish רֹ֝אָ֗יו <S%H7200><s%> they which have seen יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> him shall say אַיּֽוֹ׃ <S%H335><s%> Where

כַּחֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> as a dream יָ֭עוּף <S%H5774><s%> He shall fly away וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִמְצָא֑וּהוּ <S%H4672><s%> and shall not be found וְ֝יֻדַּ֗ד <S%H5074><s%> yea he shall be chased away כְּחֶזְי֥וֹן <S%H2384><s%> as a vision לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> of the night

עַ֣יִן <S%H5869><s%> The eye שְׁ֭זָפַתּוּ <S%H7805><s%> also [which] saw וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תוֹסִ֑יף <S%H3254><s%> him shall [see him] no more וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no ע֝֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer תְּשׁוּרֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> any more behold מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> neither shall his place

בָּ֭נָיו <S%H1121><s%> His children יְרַצּ֣וּ <S%H7521><s%> shall seek to please דַלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְ֝יָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> and his hands תָּשֵׁ֥בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> shall restore אוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H202><s%> their goods

עַ֭צְמוֹתָיו <S%H6106><s%> His bones מָלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> are full [עֲלוּמֹו כ] (עֲלוּמָ֑יו <S%H5934><s%> youth ק) וְ֝עִמּ֗וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> with him in the dust תִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> which shall lie down

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though תַּמְתִּ֣יק <S%H4985><s%> be sweet בְּפִ֣יו <S%H6310><s%> in his mouth רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> Though wickedness יַ֝כְחִידֶ֗נָּה <S%H3582><s%> [though] he hide תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לְשׁוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H3956><s%> it under his tongue

יַחְמֹ֣ל <S%H2550><s%> [Though] he spare עָ֭לֶיהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and will not יַֽעַזְבֶ֑נָּה <S%H5800><s%> it and forsake וְ֝יִמְנָעֶ֗נָּה <S%H4513><s%> it not but keep it still בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within חִכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2441><s%> his mouth

לַ֭חְמוֹ <S%H3899><s%> [Yet] his meat בְּמֵעָ֣יו <S%H4578><s%> in his bowels נֶהְפָּ֑ךְ <S%H2015><s%> is turned מְרוֹרַ֖ת <S%H4846><s%> [it is] the gall פְּתָנִ֣ים <S%H6620><s%> of asps בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> within

חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> riches בָּ֭לַע <S%H1104><s%> He hath swallowed down וַיְקִאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H6958><s%> and he shall vomit them up again מִ֝בִּטְנ֗וֹ <S%H990><s%> of his belly יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֥נּוּ <S%H3423><s%> shall cast them out אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> God

רֹאשׁ־ <S%H7219><s%> the poison פְּתָנִ֥ים <S%H6620><s%> of asps יִינָ֑ק <S%H3243><s%> He shall suck תַּֽ֝הַרְגֵ֗הוּ <S%H2026><s%> shall slay לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue אֶפְעֶֽה׃ <S%H660><s%> the viper's

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> does not יֵ֥רֶא <S%H7200><s%> He shall not see בִפְלַגּ֑וֹת <S%H6390><s%> the rivers נַהֲרֵ֥י <S%H5104><s%> the floods נַ֝חֲלֵ֗י <S%H5158><s%> the brooks דְּבַ֣שׁ <S%H1706><s%> of honey וְחֶמְאָֽה׃ <S%H2529><s%> and butter

מֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> for shall he restore יָ֭גָע <S%H3022><s%> That which he laboured וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and cannot יִבְלָ֑ע <S%H1104><s%> and shall not swallow [it] down כְּחֵ֥יל <S%H2428><s%> according to [his] substance תְּ֝מוּרָת֗וֹ <S%H8545><s%> [shall] the restitution וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעֲלֹֽס׃ <S%H5965><s%> [be] and he shall not rejoice

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רִ֭צַּץ <S%H7533><s%> Because he hath oppressed עָזַ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> [and] hath forsaken דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor בַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house גָּ֝זַ֗ל <S%H1497><s%> [because] he hath violently taken away וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not יִבֶנֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H1129><s%> which he builded

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> Surely he shall not feel שָׁלֵ֣ו <S%H7961><s%> quietness בְּבִטְנ֑וֹ <S%H990><s%> in his belly בַּ֝חֲמוּד֗וֹ <S%H2530><s%> of that which he desired לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> he shall not save

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> Nothing שָׂרִ֥יד <S%H8300><s%> be left לְאָכְל֑וֹ <S%H400><s%> There shall none of his meat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָחִ֥יל <S%H2342><s%> therefore shall no man look טוּבֽוֹ׃ <S%H2898><s%> for his goods

בִּמְלֹ֣אות <S%H4390><s%> the fullness שִׂ֭פְקוֹ <S%H5607><s%> of his sufficiency יֵ֣צֶר <S%H3334><s%> he shall be in straits ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of everyone יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> every hand עָמֵ֣ל <S%H6001><s%> of the wicked תְּבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> shall come

יְהִ֤י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become לְמַלֵּ֬א <S%H4390><s%> [When] he is about to fill בִטְנ֗וֹ <S%H990><s%> his belly יְֽשַׁלַּח־ <S%H7971><s%> [God] shall cast בּ֭וֹ חֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> the fury אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his wrath וְיַמְטֵ֥ר <S%H4305><s%> upon him and shall rain עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and בִּלְחוּמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3894><s%> [it] upon him while he is eating

יִ֭בְרַח <S%H1272><s%> He shall flee מִנֵּ֣שֶׁק <S%H5402><s%> weapon בַּרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> from the iron תַּ֝חְלְפֵ֗הוּ <S%H2498><s%> shall strike him through קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> [and] the bow נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> of steel

שָׁלַף֮ <S%H8025><s%> It is drawn וַיֵּצֵ֪א <S%H3318><s%> and cometh out מִגֵּ֫וָ֥ה <S%H1465><s%> of the body וּ֭בָרָק <S%H1300><s%> yea the glittering sword מִֽמְּרֹרָת֥וֹ <S%H4846><s%> of his gall יַהֲלֹ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> cometh out עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֵמִֽים׃ <S%H367><s%> terrors

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Complete חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <S%H2822><s%> All darkness טָמ֪וּן <S%H2934><s%> [shall be] hid לִצְפּ֫וּנָ֥יו <S%H6845><s%> in his secret places תְּ֭אָכְלֵהוּ <S%H398><s%> shall consume אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נֻפָּ֑ח <S%H5301><s%> not blown יֵ֖רַע <S%H3415><s%> him it shall go ill שָׂרִ֣יד <S%H8300><s%> with him that is left בְּאָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H168><s%> in his tabernacle
יְגַלּ֣וּ <S%H1540><s%> shall reveal שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heaven עֲוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity וְ֝אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth מִתְקוֹמָ֘מָ֥ה <S%H6965><s%> shall rise up לֽוֹ׃

יִ֭גֶל <S%H1540><s%> shall depart יְב֣וּל <S%H2981><s%> The increase בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house נִ֝גָּר֗וֹת <S%H5064><s%> [and his goods] shall flow away בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> of his wrath

זֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This חֵֽלֶק־ <S%H2506><s%> This [is] the portion אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> of a wicked מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> from God וְנַחֲלַ֖ת <S%H5159><s%> and the heritage אִמְר֣וֹ <S%H561><s%> appointed מֵאֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> unto him by God פ
